Content: Galactic regions can be used to make the galaxy more heterogeneous.
Give it large scale texture so to speak.
Therefor each region is assigned one or multiple themes,
like: a area rich in nebulae, natives or minerals,
or more or easy/difficult to travers.
Player spawn themes like the "lone empire",
"the sector of the 3 powers" would also be a good idea,
but balancement could be a challenge.
